Song.title: Amazing Grace (My Chains Are Gone)/How Marvelous

Arrangement.text:
CHORUS: My ch[D/F#]ains are g[G]one, I’ve been set f[D/F#]ree My God, my S[G]avior has ransomed [D/A]me And [D/F#]like a fl[G]ood His mercy r[D/F#]eigns Unending l[Em]ove, am[A7]azing gr[D]ace
Verse 1: I [D]stand amazed in the presence, Of [A]Jesus the Na[A7]za[D]rene, [D/F#] And [G]wonder how He could [D]love [Bm7]me, A [D/F#]sinner, con[A7]demned, un[D]clean.
Verse 2: He [E]took my sins and my sorrows, He [B]made them His ve[B7]ry [E]own; [E/G#] He [A]bore the burden to [E]Calvary, [C#m7] And [E/G#]suffered and [B7]died a[E]lone.
Chorus: [E]How marvelous! How wonderful! [B]And my song shall [F#m7]e[E/G#]ver [B]be: [E]How marvelous! [E/G#]How wonderful! [F#m7]Is my [E/G#]Savior’s [A]love [B7]for [E]me!
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus my chains are gone ive been set free my god my savior has ransomed me and like a flood his mercy reigns unending love amazing grace verse 1 i stand amazed in the presence of jesus the nazarene and wonder how he could love me a sinner condemned unclean verse 2 he took my sins and my sorrows he made them his very own he bore the burden to calvary and suffered and died alone chorus how marvelous how wonderful and my song shall ever be how marvelous how wonderful is my saviors love for me
